general_advisory: As per Extended Range Forecast of IMD, MC, Bhubaneswar, isolated light rain/ thundershower is very likely at one or two places during 9th to 15th February 2024. No large change in minimum temperature is expected, and minimum temperature is likely to be slightly above normal. Farmers are advised to start sowing (nursery) for summer vegetable cultivation. Spraying operations should be done within two days, and irrigation should be delayed due to the chance of cloudy weather and light rainfall.

advisory: Yellow mosaic virus attack symptoms observed, spraying of Acetamiprid 20% SP recommended under clear sky.
Yellow mosaic virus attack symptoms observed, spraying of Acetamiprid 20% SP recommended under clear sky.
To control aphid and mustard sawfly attack, spraying of Imidachlorprid or Thiamethoxam and Chloropyriphos recommended under clear weather condition.
Sowing recommended with seed treatment and seed rate of 2-2.5 kg per acre.
Spraying of Imazethapyr recommended within 15 days of sowing, considering the chance of rainfall.
Sowing of tomato seed for summer cultivation recommended, along with pest control measures.
Pest control measures including spraying of Emamectin Benzoate and Thiamethoxam recommended.
Pest control measures including spraying of Emamectin Benzoate and Thiamethoxam recommended.
